text: Location of Zimbabwe The list of non-marine molluscs of Zimbabwe is a list of freshwater and land species that form a part of the molluscan fauna of Zimbabwe (wildlife of Zimbabwe). == Freshwater gastropods == Viviparidae * Bellamya capillata (Frauenfeld, 1865) Thiaridae * Melanoides tuberculata (O. F. Müller, 1774) Planorbidae * Bulinus tropicus (Krauss, 1848) * Planorbella duryi (Wetherby, 1879) * Physa acuta * Biomphalaria pfeifferi * Bulinus globosus * Bulinus truncatus Lymnaeidae * Radix natalensis (Krauss, 1848)Appleton C., Ghamizi M., Jørgensen A., Kristensen T. K., Stensgaard A-S. & Van Damme D. (2009). Lymnaea natalensis. In: IUCN 2010. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2010.4. . Downloaded on 4 December 2010. * Pseudosuccinea columella == Land gastropods == Succineidae * Oxyloma patentissima (Pfeiffer, 1853)Brendonck L. et al. (2003). "The impact of water hyacinth (Eichhornia crassipes) in a eutrophic subtropical impoundment (Lake Chivero, Zimbabwe). II. Species diversity". Arch. Hydrobiol. 158(3): 389-405. PDF . == Freshwater bivalves == == See also == Lists of molluscs of surrounding countries: * List of non-marine molluscs of South Africa * List of non-marine molluscs of Botswana * List of non-marine molluscs of Zambia * List of non-marine molluscs of Mozambique == References == == External links == * * Molluscs Zimbabwe Zimbabwe
title: List of non-marine molluscs of Zimbabwe
